Andy Coulson has always claimed he knew nothing about the hacking but last week he quit as David Cameron 's communications chief, saying when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on. Even with the number of suspects and alleged victims growing, many doubt the scandal will change Britain's keenly competitive tabloid culture. Newspapers believe readers are hungry for scoops- and will forgive tabloids their transgressions

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's "Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said. Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.

I have seen some ridiculous things in my 31 years on this planet, but Michael Vick getting the key to the city of Dallas because he, according to Dwaine Caraway , is telling the kids and exchanging with them the rights and wrongs of the things that he did and encouraging kids to further their education and to not deal drugs. To obey their parents and pick the people they hang around with. That is a message I would challenge anybody to say that not one kid across America shouldn't hear from people in notoriety such as Michael Vick . Come again?
